attributes.action: Consider that issues raised in 'The Great Global Warming Swindle' deserves serious consideration as an alternative view and a reasoned response from the Prime minister.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The recent television documentary raised a number of issues that previously have not been discussed openly by scientists and politians.  The evidence put forward is of sufficient importance to deserve full and open debate.  I urge you to sign the petition if you think that such a debate would be useful in extending our understanding of the situation, and not necessarily because you agree with the views expressed in the programme.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
